desc.en: Reset the accumulated power usage (kWh), note that this can not be reversed.
desc.nl: Stel geaccumuleerde stroomverbruik (kWh) opnieuw in, dit kan niet worden teruggedraaid.

instruction.en:
Activate the add mode on the device by clicking the inclusion button in the module. 
The Adding Mode is indicated by status LED is blinking until a timeout occurs after 10 seconds or if the module has been added to the Z-Wave network.

hint.en: Lifeline. Lifeline group for the entire module. Sends Basic Report On / Off when the relay is turned on or off. Sends Meter Report with energy data for the load connected to the relay output.

Sends Sensor Multilevel Report for input 1.
Nodes in this group will receive information of the current temperature measured by the NTC connected to input 1.

Sends Sensor Multilevel Report for input 2.
Nodes in this group will receive information of the current temperature measured by the NTC connected to input 2.
Nodes in this group receives Basic Report On / Off when the flood sensor detects a flood. Normally used for visualization in the Controller.
Nodes in this group receives Basic Set On / Off when the flood sensor detects a flood.
Nodes in this group receives Notification Report when the flood sensor detects a flood. The notification events reported are: ”Water leak detected ”0x02 and ”ldle” 0x00.
